job.title: Sr. Network Data Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtPosition Sr ltstronggtltstronggtNetwork Data EngineerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtLocation ltstronggtltstronggtGreensboro NCltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtBroad IT knowledge CISCO MPLS BGP OSPF RIP VPN Riverbed InternetltbrgtltbrgtGood knowledge and experience in Network WAN operationsltbrgtltbrgtExperience in working in a global organizationltbrgtltbrgtGood knowledge in RiverbedltbrgtltbrgtCCIE certificate in Routing ampamp SwitchingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtCCNP Certificate In Design RequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtGood knowledge and practical experience in the WAN area in a global environment Personal ProfileltbrgtltbrgtExcellent communication and presentation skills in English and Swedish both written and spokenltbrgtltbrgtCustomer oriented service minded and result drivenltbrgtltbrgtAnalytic skills and ability to prioritizeltbrgtltbrgtExcellent social and interpersonal skillsltbrgtltbrgtGoal and result oriented with an open attitudeltbrgtltbrgtContinuous personal developmentltbrgtltbrgtDocumentation skills 1 To perform value addition activities CIP and SIP and implement strategies to improve productivity 2 To implement Profit Implement Plan PIP review Budget vs Actual Cost and analyse the deviation to plan strategies to reduce deviation through levers like Automation and selfdriven initiatives 3 To ensure retention of accounts that are due for renewal or maintain high level of customer satisfaction ACSAT 4 To ensure that all responsibilities and project deliverables are completed within SLAs through effective team management and monthly reviews 5 To ensure generation of an account level EE and EN revenue 6 To ensure absorption of freshers as per the defined account targets 7 To identify attrition percentage in accounts and take up initiatives to reduce the same
